Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at South Shore Drive/72nd
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 71st, Coles, 75th, and South Shore due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/72nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 71st, Coles, 75th, and South Shore due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/72nd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Argyle. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Argyle.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
